strings.name: ASP.NET Core Web API
strings.description: A project template for creating an ASP.NET Core application with an example Controller for a RESTful HTTP service. This template can also be used for ASP.NET Core MVC Views and Controllers.
strings.parameter.DisableOpenAPI.name: Enable _OpenAPI support
strings.parameter.UseMinimalAPIs.name: Use controllers (uncheck to use minimal APIs)
strings.parameter.UseMinimalAPIs.description: Whether to generate an explicit Program class and Main method instead of top-level statements.
